articles.name: Advertising Business Service Terms
articles.title: Advertising Business Service Terms
articles.body:
Effective Date: January 22, 2026

Welcome! Thank you for your interest in Discord's advertising business products and services (collectively, "Business Services"). The Business Services are “services” as defined in Discord’s Terms of Service.

These Advertising Business Services Terms ("Business Terms") apply to your access to and use of the Business Services and set forth the legal obligations between us and you.

When we say "Discord," "we," "us," and "our" in these Business Terms, we mean Discord Inc. and its subsidiaries and related companies, unless otherwise set forth in additional terms applicable to a given Business Service.  When we say “Partner,” “you,” or “yours,” we mean the entity identified in an Insertion Order (“IO”)or other ordering document that has elected to use the Business Services.

When we say "Terms" in these Business Terms, we mean, collectively, these Business Terms, the applicable Insertion Order to which these Business Terms are incorporated by reference, our Terms of Service (including our Discord Community Guidelines), our Ads Policy, and any other applicable terms, policies, and guidelines we make available. If you use other Discord business products and services in connection with the Business Services, then the terms for those other products or services also apply to you. If there is a conflict among these documents, the following order of precedence applies (highest to lowest): (1) the applicable Insertion Order, (2) these Business Terms, and (3) any additional terms, policies, and guidelines. This order of precedence applies unless the conflicting provision in a lower-priority document expressly states that it controls over these Business Terms with respect to a specific subject matter.

Important Note: Section 9: Disputes incorporates the dispute resolution provision from our Terms of Service, which includes an arbitration clause and class action waiver that applies to all U.S.-based Discord users including users of the Business Services. Please read this section carefully as it may significantly affect your legal rights, including your right to file a lawsuit in court.

Section 1: Use of the Business Services

a. License to you

Subject to your compliance with the Terms, we grant you a limited, non-exclusive, non-sublicensable, non-transferable, non-assignable, revocable license to access and use the Business Services solely as necessary to optimize the applicable Ad campaign(s) (inclusive of Quests) on Discord to the extent permitted under the Terms. We reserve all rights, title, and interest not expressly granted in the Terms and you may not access or use the Business Services except as set forth in the Terms.

b. Restrictions

In addition to any restrictions under Discord’s Terms of Service, you will not (and will not attempt to or permit or enable others to): (i)  use the Business Services in a manner or for a purpose not permitted under these Business Terms; (ii) gather, access, or otherwise process any personal data via the Business Services for any purpose without Discord's prior written consent; (iii) transmit any malicious code, viruses, or other harmful software that could damage or impair the Business Services; (iv) sell, resell, rent, lease, transfer, license, sublicense, or provide access to the Business Services, and the information contained therein, without Discord's express prior written approval; (v) use the Business Services to build a competing product or service, or (vi) use the Business Services, or any information contained therein, for the purposes of training any AI or machine learning model.

Section 3: Representations and Warranties

You represent and warrant that: (i) you are an entity validly existing and in good standing under the laws of your jurisdiction of incorporation or organization; (ii) you have the full power and rights to perform your obligations under these Business Terms; (iii) you will comply with the Business Terms and all applicable laws and regulations, including export control, economic sanctions, and anti-boycott laws when using the Business Services; and (iv) all information provided or made available by you via or in connection with your use of the Business Services is complete and accurate in all material respects.

If you are using the Business Services as agent for another individual or entity, then you represent and warrant that: (i) you are authorized to, and do, bind that individual or entity to these Business Terms; and (ii) all of your actions, and other such entities’ actions, in connection with these Business Terms are and will be within the scope of the agency relationship between you and that individual or entity, and in accordance with any applicable legal and fiduciary duties. If you are using the Business Services as principal in connection with services you provide to another individual or entity, then you represent and warrant that you will procure that such individual or entity will comply with, and you will remain primarily liable for any obligations ascribed to or actions taken by that individual or entity under these Business Terms.

Section 4: Intellectual Property and Ownership

Discord owns all rights, title, and interest in the Business Services and any data, insights, analytics, or reports derived from the Business Services. All rights not expressly granted herein are reserved Discord.

Section 5: Termination

Discord may terminate these Business Terms, and modify, suspend, terminate access to, or discontinue the availability of any Business Services, at any time in its sole discretion.  Where practicable, Discord will use reasonable efforts to provide advance notice of any material modification, suspension, or discontinuation of Business Services, but shall have no liability for failure to do so. Upon termination, you will immediately stop using the Business Service.

Section 6: Warranty Disclaimer

DISCORD MAKES NO REPRESENTATIONS OR WARRANTIES REGARDING THE BUSINESS SERVICES. BUSINESS SERVICES ARE PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS, IMPLIED, OR STATUTORY. DISCORD DISCLAIMS ALL WARRANTIES, INCLUDING WARRANTIES OF ACCURACY, RELIABILITY, MERCHANTABILITY, OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. YOU ACKNOWLEDGE THAT THE BUSINESS SERVICES ARE PROVIDED SOLELY AT DISCORD'S DISCRETION AND DISCORD HAS NO OBLIGATION TO PROVIDE, CONTINUE PROVIDING, OR TO UPDATE ANY BUSINESS SERVICES.  YOUR USE OF PRODUCTS OR SERVICES PROVIDED BY A THIRD PARTY IN CONNECTION WITH THE BUSINESS SERVICES IS AT YOUR OWN RISK AND IS SUBJECT TO THE THIRD-PARTY’S TERMS. DISCORD IS NOT LIABLE FOR ANY DAMAGES OR LOSSES INCURRED BY YOU AS A RESULT OF YOUR USE OF ANY THIRD-PARTY PRODUCTS OR SERVICES.

Section 7: Indemnification

You shall indemnify, defend, and hold harmless Discord and its affiliates, directors, officers, employees, and agents against all claims, liabilities, costs, expenses, damages and losses (including any direct, indirect or consequential losses, loss of profit, loss of reputation and all interest, penalties and legal costs and all other reasonable professional costs and expenses) ("Claims") arising from or related to your breach of the Business Terms or any claim that your use of the Business Services violates any third party rights or applicable laws.  Discord will promptly notify you in writing of any indemnification claim, but any failure to notify you will not relieve you from any indemnity liability or obligation, except to the extent you are materially prejudiced by that failure. Discord will reasonably cooperate with you, at your expense, in connection with the defense of any indemnification claim. You will not compromise or settle any claim without Discord's prior written consent, which Discord may provide in its sole discretion.

Section 8: Limitation of Liability

IN NO EVENT WILL DISCORD OR ITS AFFILIATES BE LIABLE FOR ANY INDIRECT, SPECIAL, INCIDENTAL, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES, INCLUDING FOR LOSS OF REVENUE OR PROFITS, OR FOR LOSS OF DATA OR GOODWILL, OR FOR ANY EXEMPLARY OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES; AND DISCORD AND ITS AFFILIATES AGGREGATE LIABILITY FOR ALL CLAIMS RELATING TO THE BUSINESS SERVICES SHALL NOT EXCEED THE GREATER OF (A) $100 AND (B) THE AMOUNT OF  FEES PAID OR PAYABLE TO DISCORD UNDER THE INSERTION ORDER GIVING RISE TO LIABILITY.

Section 9: Disputes

For any disputes arising from or related to the Business Services, the “Settling disputes between you and Discord” section in our Terms of Service applies, where references to the “services” will mean the Business Services, “these terms” will mean these Business Terms, and the date for emailing an opt-out notice is within 30 days of the applicable IO Effective Date. Notwithstanding anything contrary in the Discord Terms of Service, the Federal Arbitration Act, federal arbitration law, and New York law will apply, regardless of conflict of laws rules, to these Business Terms.  Any arbitration will be seated in and take place in New York, New York.  Any disputes that are not subject to arbitration will be resolved in the state and federal courts in New York, New York, and the parties each consent to venue and personal jurisdiction in these courts.  

Section 10: Modifications

We may update these Business Terms from time to time. We will provide you with reasonable notice and post updated terms in advance of the updated terms taking effect, unless the changes are urgent (for example, to comply with applicable law or correct non-material errors). If you continue to access or use the Business Services after the changes have taken effect, it means that you agree to the changes. If you do not agree, you must stop using the Business Services. You can review the most current version of these Business Terms at any time by visiting this page. 

Section 11: Miscellaneous

To the extent permitted by law, we each agree to contract in the English language and if we provide a translation of the Business Terms, we do so for your convenience only and the English Terms will solely govern our relationship. The term “including” means “including without limitation.” The Business Terms do not create any third party beneficiary rights or any agency, partnership, or joint venture. Nothing in the Business Terms will limit either party's ability to seek injunctive relief. We are not liable for failure or delay in performance to the extent caused by circumstances beyond our reasonable control. If you do not comply with the Business Terms, and Discord does not take action right away, this does not mean that Discord is giving up any rights that it may have (such as taking action in the future). If it turns out that a particular term is not enforceable, this will not affect any other terms. The Business Terms are the entire agreement between you and Discord relating to its subject and supersede any prior or contemporaneous agreements on that subject (unless, and solely to the extent, you and Discord have entered into a separate written agreement to expressly supersede). For information about how to contact Discord, please visit our Terms of Service. You may not assign, sublicense, delegate, or otherwise transfer any of your rights or obligations under the Business Terms to any third party without the prior written consent of Discord. For clarity, upon a Discord-approved transfer, the Business Terms apply to the transferee as “you” and they assume the obligations and liabilities of the transferor under the Business Terms. Any transfer in violation of this provision is null and void. Any change of control or material ownership of you is hereby deemed an assignment.

articles.name: Nitro 2-Week Trial Offer
articles.title: Nitro 2-Week Trial Offer
articles.body:
Try two weeks of Nitro for $0 with our promotion valid through January 29, 2026! Read below to learn more.

What this article covers:

  • Promotion Summary
    • Eligibility Conditions
  • What is Discord Nitro?
  • How do Nitro Trials work?
  • How do I claim my Nitro Trial?
    • On Desktop/Browser
    • On Mobile
  • Frequently Asked Questions
Note: Please make sure your Discord app is updated to the latest version! If you don’t see the promotion offer in your app after you update, you are not eligible for this promotion.

Promotion Summary

Offer Details: Eligible users can enjoy a 2-week trial of Discord Nitro on us when you subscribe to Nitro (Monthly or Yearly) on Discord’s desktop, browser, or mobile  app.

  • Your trial begins as soon as you sign up for a Nitro plan. You will not be charged until your trial ends.

Eligibility Conditions

Eligibility requirements include:

  • You have not had an active Nitro subscription (Nitro, Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, including trials) within the 30 days prior to the date you attempted to claim this promotion. 
  • You have not received a Nitro trial or discount offer in the past 45 days.
  • You have not redeemed a Nitro trial or discount in the past 90 days.  
  • You do not have an active Server Boost subscription.
  • You must maintain a valid payment method on your account.

Note that eligibility on mobile depends on your device and subscription history:

  • Android users are eligible if they meet the other requirements and have not subscribed to Nitro in the past 30 days.
  • iOS users are eligible if they meet the other requirements, have previously subscribed to Nitro through Apple, and have not subscribed in the past 30 days.

Regional availability: This promotion is only available in certain regions. If you do not see the promotion offer in your app, you are not eligible for this promotion.

Deadline for Claiming Promo: This promotion must be claimed before January 29, 2026 at 5pm PT. 

What is Discord Nitro?

Discord Nitro is our subscription plan that unlocks a world of perks that’ll make your time on Discord as fun as ever! Personalize and enhance your experience with popular perks like HD streaming, 500MB file uploads, profile and avatar customizations, and more:

  • Custom & Animated Emojis
  • Custom Profiles
  • HD Streaming
  • Discord App Color Themes
  • Unlimited Soundboard Access & Entry Sounds
  • Extended Quest Rewards
  • Special Shop Perks
  • More Nitro & Nitro Basic perks

How do Nitro Trials work?

  • Nitro Trial periods are free. You’ll be asked to add a credit card when you redeem a trial, but you will not be charged until the trial ends.
  • For the Nitro 2-week trial, your card will be charged after the two week period unless you cancel beforehand. You can cancel at any time during the trial and you will not be charged. Learn more about cancelling Nitro here.
  • Your subscription will automatically renew at the end of the trial period as a paid plan based on the option you selected (monthly or annual).

How do I claim my Nitro Trial?

If you’re eligible to claim this Nitro offer, you’ll want to head over to the Nitro Tab.

On Desktop/Browser

Step 1: Go to the Nitro tab

On the desktop or browser app, press the Direct Messages button in the top left corner and then select the Nitro tab. Alternatively, you can navigate to your User Settings > Nitro.

Step 2: Subscribe to Nitro Monthly or Yearly 

Once you are on the Nitro page - press Claim Offer on the trial banner.

Nitro 2-Week Trial Offer on Desktop

Step 3: Start Your 2-Week Trial

You’ll be asked to select either a monthly or yearly plan for Nitro.

Then, on the next screen, enter your credit card information and other payment details. 

Nitro payment page for 2-week trial on Desktop

Step 4: Start Your 2-Week Trial

Upon successful completion of sign up, your account will be upgraded to Nitro and your 2-week trial will begin! At the end of your 2-week trial, your paid subscription will begin based on the plan you selected. 

On Mobile

1. To get started on mobile, tap on your avatar in the bottom right corner. 
2. Select the Nitro button in the upper right to navigate to the Nitro page. Alternatively, tap the Settings icon and navigate to the Get Nitro page.

Mobile App: Avatar Icon (Upper) and Nitro Button (Lower)

3. Sign up for Nitro by tapping the Claim Offer. 

NOTE: If you don't have any existing payment methods, you'll be prompted to enter your payment information.

4.  Review the details, then tap Claim Offer to start your trial.

Nitro 2-Week Trial Offer on Mobile

5. Once you've successfully signed up, your trial will begin. 

Frequently Asked Questions

Q: Why don't I see this offer in my Discord app?

A: If you don't see any promotion details on your Nitro tab across the desktop, browser, or mobile apps, it is because you do not meet the eligibility criteria.

Q: What happens if I have an active Server Boosting subscription?

A: If you have an active Server Boost subscription, you will not be able to claim and redeem this promotion.

Note: if you don’t see the trial on your mobile device, head over to the Nitro page on desktop to check for availability.

Q: Why do I need to submit my payment info to redeem Nitro?

A: Because Nitro is a subscription, at the end of your 2-week trial, we will start your first billing cycle so you can continue to enjoy Nitro.
However, you can cancel Nitro at any time, including during trial. To cancel Nitro on desktop, head to your User Settings > select Subscriptions > press Cancel within the Nitro banner. To cancel Nitro on mobile, tap on the cogwheel []  in the top right > Billing Settings > Manage Nitro. From here, follow the prompts on the screen until the cancellation is confirmed. You may also cancel your subscription through your mobile device app store. 

Note: You will not be charged until the trial ends and the membership renews. We’ll send an email before the paid membership begins, and you’ll have the opportunity to cancel before you are charged by following the steps here.

Q: Why do I see a temporary hold/charge on my account when this is supposed to be a trial?

A: There is no charge for this 2-week Nitro trial. However, there will be a temporary hold placed on the payment method upon activating the promotion. This is to help Discord confirm that the submitted payment method is valid. This charge will appear in your Discord transaction history, and it may appear as a hold on your payment method.
After you redeem the trial offer, we reverse the temporary hold to return the funds, and you’ll see that reflected in your Discord transaction history. Your bank may take longer to remove the hold from your payment method.

Note: Banks will usually remove the temporary hold from your account within a few business days.

If your Discord transaction history does not show the hold released after 5 business days, please let us know at https://dis.gd/contact, and our support team will be able to investigate this issue further.

Q: If I have Nitro Credit, can I still claim the 2-week Nitro trial offer? 

A: Yes, if you have Nitro Credit, you are still eligible to claim the trial offer if you meet all other eligibility criteria. Your Nitro Credit will automatically activate after your 2-week trial, before your paid subscription begins. If you have more questions about Nitro Credit, learn more here.

articles.name: Monthly Orbs for Nitro Members FAQ
articles.title: Monthly Orbs for Nitro Members FAQ
articles.body:
Nitro subscribers can now receive Discord Orbs on a monthly basis just for maintaining their Nitro subscription! These Orbs are automatically added to your account, giving you even more ways to get Nitro Credit or Shop items to better customize your Discord experience.

What this article covers:

  • What are Nitro Orbs Drops?
  • How to Earn a Nitro Orb Drops
    • Eligibility Requirements
  • How Often You'll Receive Orbs
  • Viewing Your Nitro Orbs Drop
  • Frequently Asked Questions
Important: Nitro Orbs Drops are currently in beta and being tested with select users. During this experimental phase, eligible users may receive different amounts of monthly Orbs. We appreciate your patience as we refine this feature!

What are Nitro Orbs Drops?

Want to learn more? 
You can learn more about Discord Orbs here.

Nitro Orbs Drop is a benefit for Nitro subscribers that provide additional Discord Orbs on a monthly basis. As a Nitro member, you'll automatically receive monthly Orbs that you can use in the Shop to get Nitro Credit, Avatar Decorations, Profile Effects, and other eligible Shop items. 

These Orbs are added directly to your total Orbs balance. They're in addition to any Orbs you earn through Discord Quests, giving you more opportunities to personalize your Discord experience. 

How to Earn Monthly Orbs with Nitro 

Eligibility Requirements

Tip: For eligible users who subscribe to Nitro, it may take up to 1 week until your first Nitro Orbs drop.

To receive a Nitro Orbs Drop, you need:

  • An active paid Nitro subscription 
  • Your subscription must be in good standing (for example, subscription is not in a grace period due to payment issues)
  • Be part of the Nitro Orbs Drop experiment group

Nitro Orbs Rewards are included for:

  • Monthly Nitro subscriptions
  • Annual Nitro subscriptions
  • Subscriptions with selected promotional discount (including BOGO offers)

Nitro Orbs Rewards are NOT included for:

  • Gifted Nitro subscriptions
  • Nitro through Nitro Credits
  • Nitro Basic or Classic plans
  • Accounts with suspended or terminated subscriptions
  • 2-week Nitro trials

How Often You'll Receive Orbs

Note: Your Orbs are automatically deposited into your Orbs balance on a monthly basis—you don't need to claim them manually.

For eligible users in the Nitro Orbs Drop experiment, you will see a notice in your Discord app each month when your monthly Nitro Orbs have been added to your Orbs balance. 

You’ve got Orbs! notification

Viewing Your Nitro Orbs Drop

Note: Currently, you can only view your total Nitro Orbs earned and your upcoming Nitro Orbs Drop on the desktop and web versions of Discord. This information isn't available in the mobile app just yet.

However, your total Orbs balance will remain consistent across all platforms. 

1. Navigate to your Direct Messages list by selecting the Discord app icon in the upper-left corner. 

2. Press the Nitro Home tab to the right of your server list. 

3. Scroll down the page until you see “Earn monthly Nitro Rewards”. 

Nitro Rewards earned

Here you'll see a Nitro Orbs Drop banner that shows:

  • Number of Days left until your next Nitro Orbs Drop
  • The total amount of Orbs you've earned through Nitro Orbs Drops
Note: Days where you are consuming Nitro Credits are not included in your monthly countdown. You may notice your countdown increase when Nitro Credits are added. Learn more about Nitro Credits here.

Frequently Asked Questions

Q: How many Orbs will I receive each month?

A: This number may differ based on users and the month during our beta experiment period. We appreciate your patience as we refine this feature! 

Q: Do Orbs expire?

A: No, your Orbs will not expire! Once they're granted to your account, you can hold onto them for as long as you like. 

Q: What happens to my Orbs if I cancel my subscription?

A: You keep any Orbs you’ve already earned from previous months. After you cancel, you’ll stop receiving future Nitro Orbs drops.

Q: My payment failed—will I still get my Orbs?

A: If your payment failed, you will not receive your next Nitro Orbs drop. Learn more about Payments and Billings here.

Q: Are Nitro Orbs different from Discord Orbs?

A: No, Nitro Orbs and Discord Orbs are referring to the same virtual rewards that you can earn on Discord. You can use them in the Shop to get Nitro Credit or items from the main collections. 

Q: Can I see which Orbs came from Nitro Orbs Drops vs. Quests?

A: Yes. To view your total Orbs balance, including Orbs from Nitro Orbs Drops and Quests, select the Clyde logo in the top left of your Discord app, go to the Shop tab, then select the Orbs logo in the top right. To see how many Orbs you received from monthly Nitro Orbs Drops specifically, check the Nitro Rewards section in your Viewing Your Nitro Orbs Drop.

Nitro Orbs balance

articles.name: EGS Holiday 2025 x Discord Nitro
articles.title: EGS Holiday 2025 x Discord Nitro
articles.body:
Starting from December 11, 2025 (11AM ET) to January 8, 2026 (11AM ET), Epic Game Store members can claim 1 month of Discord Nitro from the Epic Games Store. Learn below about how you can claim Discord Nitro.

Promotion Summary

Offer Details: 1 month of Discord Nitro

Who is Eligible: Users who have had an active Nitro subscription or Nitro trial in the last 12 months are not eligible to redeem this Nitro promotion.

Note: This promotion is not eligible in the following regions: Syria, Russia, Turkey, Iran, North Korea, Zaporizhzhia, Kherson, Donetsk, and Luhansk. You can learn more at this Help Center article.

Users who have had a Discord Nitro subscription at any point on their accounts and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic subscription in the past 12 months are ineligible to redeem this promotion.

If a user has had a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting subscription active on their account and they’ve never had a Nitro subscription, redeeming this promotion will override that subscription.

We will not be able to refund any leftover subscription time from those, and the user will be forfeiting the remainder of the existing subscription when activating the 1 month Nitro trial.

Users who have already claimed a gift from this promotion are not eligible to claim further gifts from this promotion.

This promotion is not eligible in the following regions: Syria, Russia, Turkey, Iran, North Korea, Zaporizhzhia, Kherson, Donetsk, and Luhansk. You can learn more at this Help Center article.

Requirements: Epic Game Store members can claim the 1 month of Nitro starting December 11, 2025, and redeem it in your Discord account by February 7, 2026 (11:59pm PT).

Subscription: After the 1 month trial period, your Nitro subscription will convert to a monthly recurring subscription, and Discord will bill your payment method for per month until you cancel it. You can cancel at any time in your Discord User Settings. 

What this article covers:

  • Promotion Summary
  • What is Discord Nitro?
  • How do I claim the Nitro Promo from my Epic Games Store account? 
  • How do I redeem the Nitro Trial on my Discord Account? 
    • Eligibility for Redeeming the Nitro Trial
    • Step by Step Redeem Instructions
      • What if I am an Active Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting Subscriber? 
  • Frequently Asked Questions
    • Promotion Details
    • Eligibility for the Promotion
    • Payment Info and Subscription Questions
    • Potential Errors and Other Issues

What is Discord Nitro?

Discord Nitro is our Subscription plan that gives you access to special perks that’ll make your time on Discord as fun as ever! Personalize and enhance your experience with popular perks like HD streaming, 500MB file uploads, profile and avatar customizations, 2 free Server Boosts, and more:

  • Custom Emojis
  • Discord App Color Themes
  • Super Reactions
  • Avatar Decorations
  • Unique Server Profiles
  • Server Boosts
  • More Nitro & Nitro Basic perks

How do I claim the Nitro Promo from my Epic Games Store account?  

Important: In order to claim this Nitro trial promotion, you must have an Epic Games Store account.

1. Head over to the Epic Game Store app from December 11, 2025 (11AM ET) to January 8, 2026 (11AM ET) and you should see the Nitro trial promotion on the homepage. 

2. Press on the promotion to get started on redeeming Nitro.

3. Then, check your email tied to your Epic Games Store account to find an email from the Epic Games Store about this promotion. Try searching for "Nitro" in your email inbox!

Important: Please make sure the email address associated with your Epic Games Store account is current and correct! Allow for up to 24 hours for email delivery and check your spam folder.

4. Once you have found the email, follow the prompts to claim the Nitro trial and you'll be automatically redirected to a browser window to redeem the promotion.

The unique promotion link will look like this: https://discord.com/billing/promotions/XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX 

How do I redeem the Nitro Trial on my Discord Account?

Once you have claimed the promo, you'll now need to officially redeem this promo on your Discord account. You must redeem this Nitro trial by February 7, 2026 (11:59M PT).

Eligibility for Redeeming the Nitro Trial

Note: This promotion is not eligible in the following regions: Syria, Russia, Turkey, Iran, North Korea, Zaporizhzhia, Kherson, Donetsk, and Luhansk.  If you receive an "Unknown Gift Code" error during the claim/redemption process, you are not eligible to redeem this promotion. You can learn more at this Help Center article.

Users who have had an active Nitro subscription or Nitro trial in the last 12 months are not eligible to redeem this Nitro promotion.

Users who have had a Discord Nitro subscription at any point on their accounts and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic subscription in the past 12 months are ineligible to redeem this promotion.

If a user has had a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting subscription active on their account and they’ve never had a Nitro subscription, redeeming this promotion will override that subscription.

Users who have already claimed a gift from this promotion are not eligible to claim further gifts from this promotion.

Step by Step Redeem Instructions

If you're eligible and ready to redeem this Nitro subscription on your own Discord account, you can follow these steps below to redeem the promo.

Note: 
- Before redeeming Nitro, make sure you are logged in your own Discord account.
- If you accidentally redeemed the Nitro promo on an account that is not yours, we are unable to provide you with another promo.

Step 1 - Pressing the Promo Link/Copying and Pasting into your Browser Window

  • Start by directly pressing the promotion link or copying and pasting the promotion link into your browser window.
Note: If you're redeeming this Nitro promo link in the Discord Gift Inventory, enter only your unique 24-digit code from the Nitro promotion link in the following format: XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX

Step 2 - Logging into Discord

  •  If you're not already logged into Discord in your browser, you will then be automatically redirected to either:

Create an account Page (Left) and Login page (Right)

Step 3 - Confirming the Correct Account and Payment Method

  • Once you have logged into your Discord account, you'll see a new message asking you to confirm that you are accepting the Nitro subscription on the correct Discord account.
    • You'll see a notice saying: "You are accepting this gift as _________" 
  • If your Discord account does not have your payment information, you'll be asked to fill out your payment details. (Note: You will not be charged until the free trial ends and the subscription renews)
  • When you've filled out all the necessary information and you're ready to redeem this promotion, press the "Accept Gift" button. 
Note: If you're logged into the incorrect Discord account, press the "Wrong account" button to login to the other account.

Step 4 - Subscription Now Activated

  • After accepting the promo to your account, you'll now be automatically redirected to your Subscriptions tab in your User Settings to see your newly activated Nitro subscription on your account.

What if I am an Active Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting Subscriber? 

Just to clarify - if you have had a Discord Nitro subscription at any point on your account and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic subscription in the past 12 months, you are ineligible to redeem this promotion.

So long as you have had a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting subscription active on your account and you’ve never had a Nitro subscription, you will be able to redeem this promotion and replace it with the 1 month Nitro subscription.

Important: By choosing to activate this 1 month trial, you will lose any features associated with your current subscriptions, and **you will not receive a refund for any remaining value on your current subscription**.

At the end of the promotion period, you'll be converted to a paying Nitro subscription per month unless you cancel your subscription.

How do I share my Code with a Friend?

If you're unable to redeem the Nitro subscription link, you can share this link with a friend to use instead.

After you press on and open the promotion link, you can directly copy the promotion URL link in the new page and send it to a friend. We recommend sending the link in a private direct message. Make sure your friend redeems the code by February 7, 2026 (11:59M PT).

Frequently Asked Questions

We know there's a lot of information to unpack on this promotion above, so we've also broken down this information in this FAQ section as well too.

  • Promotion Details
  • Eligibility for the Promotion
  • Payment Info and Subscription Questions
  • Potential Errors and Other Issues
    • Already Had/Have Nitro
    • Already Redeemed
    • Something's Wrong Here

Promotion Details

Q: How long does this promotion run for?

A: Epic Games Store users can claim Discord Nitro promo between December 11, 2025 (11AM ET) to January 8, 2026 (11AM ET),

After February 7, 2026 (11:59M PT), Epic Game Store users will no longer be able to claim a trial promo.

Q: How long does the Discord Nitro promotion last for?

A: You must redeem the Nitro promotion by February 7, 2026 (11:59M PT).

If a code has not been redeemed to the Discord account by February 7, 2026 (11:59M PT) it will expire and you will no longer be able to have 1 month of Discord Nitro.

Eligibility for the Promotion

Q: Who can claim this promotion?

A: You must have an Epic Games Store account to claim this promotion through an email sent from the Epic Games Store to your email associated with your Epic Games Store account.

Q: Who can redeem this Nitro trial to their Discord account?

A: Users who have never had an active Nitro subscription on their Discord accounts are eligible to redeem this Nitro promotion.

Additionally, users who previously had a Discord Nitro subscription and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic subscription in the past 12 months are ineligible.

This promotion is not eligible in the following regions: Syria, Russia, Turkey, Iran, North Korea, Zaporizhzhia, Kherson, Donetsk, and Luhansk. If you receive an "Unknown Gift Code" error during the claim/redemption process, you are not eligible to redeem this promotion. You can learn more at this Help Center article.

Q: What if I'm a current or previous Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or a Server Boost subscription? Can I also take part in this promotion? 

A: If you previously had a Discord Nitro subscription at any point on your accounts and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic subscription in the past 12 months, you are ineligible to redeem this promotion.

If you have had a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting subscription active on your account and you’ve never had a Nitro subscription,  you will be able to redeem this promotion and replace it with the 1 month Nitro subscription.

Important: By choosing to activate this 1 month trial, you will lose any features associated with your current subscriptions, and **you will not receive a refund for any remaining value on your current subscription**.

At the end of the promotion period, you'll be converted to a paying Nitro subscription per month unless you cancel your subscription.

Payment Info and Subscription Questions

Q: Why do I need to submit my payment info to redeem Nitro?

A: Because Nitro is a subscription plan, at the end of your 1 month trial, we will start your first billing cycle so you can continue to enjoy Nitro on Discord.

However, you can cancel the Nitro subscription at any time before the end of the 1 month.

Q: Why do I see a temporary hold/charge on my account when this is supposed to be a free promotion?

A: Just to clarify, this Nitro promotion is free, however, there will be a temporary hold placed on the payment method upon activating the promotion. This is to help Discord confirm the payment method works as expected and to prevent the use of fraudulent payment methods. This charge will appear in your Discord transaction history, and it may appear as a hold on your payment method.

We immediately reverse the temporary hold, and you’ll see that reflected in your Discord transaction history. Your bank may take longer to remove the hold from your payment method.

Note: Banks will usually remove the temporary hold from your account within a few business days.

If your Discord transaction history does not show the hold released after 5 business days, please let us know at https://dis.gd/contact, and our support team will be able to investigate this issue further.

Potential Errors and Other Issues

Q: What if I didn't receive an email from Epic Games Store with the Nitro promo link, even if I have an Epic Games Store account?

A: In order to receive an email from Epic Games Store with the Nitro promo link, you must have an Epic Games Store account.

Additionally, make sure that you've opted to receive marketing emails from the Epic Games Store. If you've unsubscribed, you sadly won't be able to see this offer. 

If you believe you are eligible for the promotion, contact Epic Games Store's support team: https://www.epicgames.com/help/en-US/   

Q: I see a Sad Trombone error when I try to redeem my Nitro promo link.

A: Would you happen to be entering this Nitro promo link from the promotion into the Discord Gift Inventory or as a link within Discord chat?

If so, this is the incorrect method for redeeming the Nitro promo link, and you will see an error when attempting to redeem the promotion.

In order to successfully claim this promotion, enter only your unique 24-digit code from the Nitro promotion link in the following format: XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX.

Q: I see a "Oh no! It looks like you have Nitro already" error when I try to redeem my Nitro promo.

A: If you're seeing an "Oh no! It looks like you have Nitro already" error, that means that the Discord account you're trying to redeem this promotion on currently has a Nitro subscription so it is ineligible for this Nitro promotion.

Please make sure you're logged into the account that you want to redeem this promotion on. Or you can give the promotion link to a friend who hasn't had Nitro before.

Q: I see a "Sorry, looks like you’ve already had a Nitro sub!" error when I try to redeem my Nitro promo.

A: If you're seeing an “Sorry, looks like you’ve already had a Nitro sub” error, that means that you've previously subscribed to Nitro on your Discord account and you won't be able to redeem this 1 month perk.

If you have never subscribed to Nitro, please submit a ticket through our support system: https://dis.gd/contact and our support team will be able to investigate further.

Be sure to include your full Discord ID and email address tied to your Discord account.

Q: I see a "Looks like this gift has already been claimed" error when I try to claim my Nitro promo.

A: If you are seeing a "Looks like this gift has already been claimed" error, that means that the Nitro promo has already been used and cannot be used again. You may need to double check if you've claimed this promo on another Discord account.

In particular, if you redeem this promo link using your mobile device, double check the browser on your mobile device and see which Discord account you are currently logged into.

Unfortunately, once the promo link has been redeemed, the promo link cannot be re-enabled, and the Nitro cannot be transferred from one account to another.

Q: I see a "Wait a Second...Looks like this code didn't work." error when I try to redeem my Nitro promo.

A: If you're seeing an “Wait a Second...Looks like this code didn't work.” error, that means that the link is invalid. If you've copy and pasted this link, we recommend you double check the link you were given once more and make sure it exactly matches the link sent to your email.

If you received this link from a friend, double check with your friend on the exact link to make sure that it matches the link in their email.

Please note that our support team is unable to intervene if your friend has given an invalid link and we will not be able to provide a new link.

Q: I see a "Sorry, This Payment Source Cannot Be Used for Redemption" error when trying to redeem my promo!

A: If you're seeing a "Sorry, This Payment Source Cannot Be Used for Redemption" error, that means that the payment method you've selected to cover the temporary $1 hold cannot be used for that purpose. 

Please keep in mind that prepaid payment methods, such as Gcash, cannot be used to cover temporary holds due to the nature of how prepaid payment methods function.

For more information on temporary holds, please check out this article!

Q: I see a “Looks like this promotion has reached its maximum number of claims” error when trying to redeem my promo!

A: If you are seeing a “Looks like this promotion has reached its maximum number of claims” error, that means the maximum limit for claims of this promotion has been reached and this promotion can no longer be claimed. If you have claimed this Nitro promotion, you are still able to redeem it to your Discord account!

Please note that the support team is unable to assist you if you run into this error and we are not able to increase the limit of claims.

Q: I see a “Looks like your email isn’t verified. Make sure to verify your email before claiming this gift.”

A: If you are seeing a “Looks like your email isn’t verified, make sure to verify your email before claiming this gift” error, you are trying to redeem this Nitro promotion on a Discord account with an email that hasn’t been verified yet.

You can check out this support article on how to resend the email verification for your Discord account. If you need help setting up your Discord account, you can read our Getting Started article. 

Q: I’m having trouble with my Epic Games Store account.

A: Reach out to Epic Games Store’s support team: https://www.epicgames.com/help/en-US/.

articles.name: Best Buy x 3 Months of Discord Nitro Promo
articles.title: Best Buy x 3 Months of Discord Nitro Promo

If you're eligible and ready to redeem this Nitro subscription on your own Discord account, you can follow these steps below to redeem the promo.

Note: 
- Before redeeming Nitro, make sure you are logged in your own Discord account.
- If you accidentally redeemed the Nitro promo on an account that is not yours, we are unable to provide you with another promo.

Step 1 - Pressing the Promo Link/Copying and Pasting into your Browser Window

  • Start by directly pressing the promotion link or copying and pasting the promotion link into your browser window.
Note: If you're redeeming this Nitro promo link in the Discord Gift Inventory, enter only your unique 24-digit code from the Nitro promotion link in the following format: XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX

Step 2 - Logging into Discord

  •  If you're not already logged into Discord in your browser, you will then be automatically redirected to either:

Create an account Page (Left) and Login page (Right)

Step 3 - Confirming the Correct Account and Payment Method

  • Once you have logged into your Discord account, you'll see a new message asking you to confirm that you are accepting the Nitro subscription on the correct Discord account.
    • You'll see a notice saying: "You are accepting this gift as _________" 
  • If your Discord account does not have your payment information, you'll be asked to fill out your payment details. (Note: You will not be charged until the free trial ends and the subscription renews)
  • When you've filled out all the necessary information and you're ready to redeem this promotion, press the "Accept Gift" button. 
Note: If you're logged into the incorrect Discord account, press the "Wrong account" button to login to the other account.

Step 4 - Subscription Now Activated

  • After accepting the promo to your account, you'll now be automatically redirected to your Subscriptions tab in your User Settings to see your newly activated Nitro subscription on your account.

What if I am an Active Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting Subscriber? 

Just to clarify - if you have had a Discord Nitro subscription at any point on your account and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic subscription in the past 12 months, you are ineligible to redeem this promotion.

So long as you have had a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting subscription active on your account and you’ve never had a Nitro subscription, you will be able to redeem this promotion and replace it with the 3 months Nitro subscription.

Important: By choosing to activate this 3 months trial, you will lose any features associated with your current subscriptions, and **you will not receive a refund for any remaining value on your current subscription**.

At the end of the promotion period, you'll be converted to a paying Nitro subscription per month unless you cancel your subscription.

How do I share my Code with a Friend?

If you're unable to redeem the Nitro subscription link, you can share this link with a friend to use instead.

After you press on and open the promotion link, you can directly copy the promotion URL link in the new page and send it to a friend. We recommend sending the link in a private direct message. Make sure your friend redeems the code by February 5, 2026 (11:59PM PT).

Frequently Asked Questions

We know there's a lot of information to unpack on this promotion above, so we've also broken down this information in this FAQ section as well too.

  • Promotion Details
  • Eligibility for the Promotion
  • Payment Info and Subscription Questions
  • Potential Errors and Other Issues
    • Already Had/Have Nitro
    • Already Redeemed
    • Something's Wrong Here

Promotion Details

Q: How long does this promotion run for?

A: My Best Buy Plus and My Best Buy Total Members can claim 3 months of Discord Nitro starting from December 1, 2025 (10PM PT) to January 6, 2026 (9PM PT).

Q: How long does the Discord Nitro promotion last for?

A: You must redeem the Nitro promotion by February 5, 2026 (11:59PM PT).

If a code has not been redeemed to the Discord account by December 5, 2026, it will expire and you will no longer be able to have 3 months of Discord Nitro.

Eligibility for the Promotion

Q: Who can claim this promotion with their Best Buy purchase?

The 3 month Nitro offer is available for My Best Buy Plus and My Best Buy Total Members Account through your dashboard. You can learn more here.

Q: Who can redeem this Nitro trial to their Discord account?

A: Users who have never had an active Nitro membership on their Discord accounts are eligible to redeem this Nitro promotion.

Additionally, users who previously had a Discord Nitro membership and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic membership in the past 12 months are ineligible.

This promotion is only available in the US and Puerto Rico where Discord Nitro and eligible My Best Buy Plus and My Best Buy Total Members. This promotion is only available in certain regions. If you receive an "Unknown Gift Code" error during the claim/redemption process, you are not eligible to redeem this promotion. You can learn more at this Help Center article.

Q: What if I'm a current or previous Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or a Server Boost membership? Can I also take part in this promotion? 

A: If you previously had a Discord Nitro membership at any point on your accounts and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic membership in the past 12 months, you are ineligible to redeem this promotion.

If you have had a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting membership active on your account and you’ve never had a Nitro membership,  you will be able to redeem this promotion and replace it with the 3 months Nitro membership.

Important: By choosing to activate this 3 months trial, you will lose any features associated with your current memberships, and **you will not receive a refund for any remaining value on your current membership**.

At the end of the promotion period, you'll be converted to a paying Nitro membership per month unless you cancel your membership.

Payment Info and Membership Questions

Q: Why do I need to submit my payment info to redeem Nitro?

A: Because Nitro is a membership plan, at the end of your 3 months trial, we will start your first billing cycle so you can continue to enjoy Nitro on Discord.

However, you can cancel the Nitro membership at any time before the end of the 3 months.

Q: Why do I see a temporary hold/charge on my account when this is supposed to be a free promotion?

A: Just to clarify, this Nitro promotion is free, however, there will be a temporary hold placed on the payment method upon activating the promotion. This is to help Discord confirm the payment method works as expected and to prevent the use of fraudulent payment methods. This charge will appear in your Discord transaction history, and it may appear as a hold on your payment method.

We immediately reverse the temporary hold, and you’ll see that reflected in your Discord transaction history. Your bank may take longer to remove the hold from your payment method.

Note: Banks will usually remove the temporary hold from your account within a few business days.

If your Discord transaction history does not show the hold released after 5 business days, please let us know at https://dis.gd/contact, and our support team will be able to investigate this issue further.

Potential Errors and Other Issues

Q: I see a "Oh no! It looks like you have Nitro already" error when I try to redeem my Nitro promo.

A: If you're seeing an "Oh no! It looks like you have Nitro already" error, that means that the Discord account you're trying to redeem this promotion on currently has a Nitro membership so it is ineligible for this Nitro promotion.

Please make sure you're logged into the account that you want to redeem this promotion on.

Q: I see a "Sorry, looks like you’ve already had a Nitro sub!" error when I try to redeem my Nitro promo.

A: If you're seeing an “Sorry, looks like you’ve already had a Nitro sub” error, that means that you've previously subscribed to Nitro on your Discord account and you won't be able to redeem this 3 months perk.

If you have never subscribed to Nitro, please submit a ticket through our support system: https://dis.gd/contact and our support team will be able to investigate further.

Be sure to include your full Discord ID and email address tied to your Discord account

Q: I see a "Looks like this gift has already been claimed" error when I try to claim my Nitro promo.

A: If you are seeing a "Looks like this gift has already been claimed" error, that means that the Nitro promo has already been used and cannot be used again. You may need to double check if you've claimed this promo on another Discord account.

Unfortunately, once the promo has been claimed, the promo cannot be re-enabled, and the Nitro cannot be transferred from one account to another.

Q: I see a "Wait a Second...Looks like this code didn't work." error when I try to redeem my Nitro promo.

A: If you're seeing an “Wait a Second...Looks like this code didn't work.” error, that means that the promo is invalid.

Please note that our support team is unable to intervene if you are given an invalid promo and we will not be able to provide a new promo.

Q: I see a “Looks like something went wrong” error when I click on “Next”.

A: There are several reasons why you may be seeing this error:

  • You are ineligible for this promotion
  • The promotion is invalid
  • The promotion has reached the maximum number of claims
  • The link is invalid

Please note that the Discord support team is not able to assist if you run into this error when attempting to redeem. See the list above for possible reasons why your account may be ineligible or otherwise unable to redeem this promotion.

Q: I see a "Sorry, This Payment Source Cannot Be Used for Redemption" error when trying to redeem my promo!

A: If you're seeing a "Sorry, This Payment Source Cannot Be Used for Redemption" error, that means that the payment method you've selected to cover the temporary $1 hold cannot be used for that purpose. 

Please keep in mind that prepaid payment methods, such as Gcash, cannot be used to cover temporary holds due to the nature of how prepaid payment methods function.

For more information on temporary holds, please check out this article!

Q: I see a “Looks like this promotion has reached its maximum number of claims” error when trying to redeem my promo!

A: If you are seeing a “Looks like this promotion has reached its maximum number of claims” error, that means the maximum limit for claims of this promotion has been reached and this promotion can no longer be claimed. If you have claimed this Nitro promotion, you are still able to redeem it to your Discord account!

Please note that the support team is unable to assist you if you run into this error and we are not able to increase the limit of claims.

Q: I see a “Looks like your email isn’t verified. Make sure to verify your email before claiming this gift.”

A: If you are seeing a “Looks like your email isn’t verified, make sure to verify your email before claiming this gift” error, you are trying to redeem this Nitro promotion on a Discord account with an email that hasn’t been verified yet.

You can check out this support article on how to resend the email verification for your Discord account. If you need help setting up your Discord account, you can read our Getting Started article. 

Q: What should I do if I'm experiencing issues with my Best Buy purchase?

A: Log into your MyBBY account to resend the redemption email or press "Redeem Now." If you need further assistance, contact Best Buy support at 1-888-BESTBUY (1-888-237-8289).

articles.name: Discord x Cloudflare Privacy Perk FAQ
articles.title: Discord x Cloudflare Privacy Perk FAQ
articles.body:
Some Nitro users now get access to Cloudflare’s premium version of WARP, WARP+ Unlimited, as part of their subscription. WARP+ enhances your privacy by encrypting a user’s traffic that makes it harder to track or sell your data. While WARP can take advantage of the many Cloudflare data centers around the world to give you a more private and robust connection, WARP+ Unlimited subscribers get access to a larger network. It applies to all internet traffic outside of Discord, covering browsing and any other online applications.

What this article covers:

  • What is the Nitro Privacy Perk?
  • How to Access the Privacy Perk
  • How to Use the Privacy Perk
    • Turning WARP+ On and Off
  • Frequently Asked Question
Info: This is an experimental feature available to select Nitro users. It is not available for Nitro Basic or Classic subscribers, users with Nitro obtained through Nitro credits (including trials), or when accessing Discord via mobile or web browser. Additionally, this feature may be unavailable in certain countries where the service is not supported.

What is the Nitro Privacy Perk?

Note: The Nitro Privacy Perk is currently in beta and only available on the Discord desktop app for Windows or Mac. Eligible users need an active, paid Nitro subscription to access this perk.

The Nitro Privacy Perk gives eligible Nitro subscribers access to Cloudflare's WARP+, a service that enhances your privacy while you browse the web and use other online applications outside of Discord by encrypting your internet traffic. 

Please note WARP+ provides an added layer of privacy when you're browsing external websites and using other apps on your computer. WARP+ only covers traffic outside of Discord, it does not affect any activity or data shared with Discord directly.

To access the Nitro Privacy Perk, you need:

  • Part of the experiment, which is available to select users only 
  • An active, paid Nitro subscription
  • Discord desktop app installed on Windows or Mac
Note: When your Nitro subscription ends, you'll automatically be placed into WARP, Cloudflare’s free version of its service. 

How to Access the Privacy Perk

The Nitro Privacy Perk is available through your Discord desktop app. 

Note: WARP+ only works while the Discord desktop app is running on Windows or Mac. This feature is not available on mobile devices or web browsers.

1. Open the Discord desktop app. 

2. Press User Settings icon [] in the bottom-left corner of the app located next to your username.

3. In the left sidebar, select WARP+. 

WARP+ tab in User Settings

4. Select Download to install.

5. Follow the instructions in WARP+ including accepting Cloudflare’s Terms and Service conditions. This will show up as an external pop-up on your desktop.

Note: You will also need to grant admin permissions. If you are on Windows, look for the Microsoft Admin icon[] on the icons bar. Click on this icon to accept admin permissions.

6. After installing, you can then toggle WARP+ on.

WARP+ enabled

Note: If you already have a WARP+ account, you’ll see an option that says Use WARP+ now toggle to enable it.

How to Use the Privacy Perk

Once you've downloaded WARP+, you can turn it on or off whenever you want. When WARP+ is active, you'll see an indicator in your system tray (Windows) or menu bar (Mac).

Turning WARP+ On and Off

Tip: The toggle in the Discord app and WARP+ are synced, so any changes you make in one will automatically apply to the other.

1. Make sure Discord is open on your desktop.

2. Look for the WARP+ icon in your system tray (Windows) or menu bar (Mac).

Cloudflare WARP icon on Windows system tray

3. Press the WARP+ icon and toggle it on or off.

WARP+ on Windows (top) and Apple (bottom)

Frequently Asked Questions

Q: Does the Privacy Perk protect my activity on Discord?

A: WARP+ protects your privacy when browsing external websites and using other applications on your computer. Your activity within Discord follows our standard privacy practices, which you can learn about in our Privacy Policy.

Q: Will this slow down my internet connection?

A: WARP+ is designed for speed, but because it encrypts your traffic, you may notice slight changes in connection performance. Most users won't notice a difference during regular browsing. 

Q: WARP+ is affecting my gaming performance. What should I do?

A: Because WARP+ encrypts all your internet traffic, it may occasionally increase latency in some online games. If you notice performance issues while gaming, try turning off WARP+ temporarily while you play, then turn it back on when you're done. Your privacy protection will resume automatically.

Q: Can I use WARP+ on mobile devices?

A: The Nitro Privacy Perk is currently only available on Windows and Mac desktop apps. We're always exploring ways to bring more value to Nitro subscribers across all platforms.

Q: Does this hide my Discord activity from Discord?

A: No, WARP+ enhances your privacy while browsing outside of Discord. Discord can still see your activity within the Discord platform according to your privacy settings and and our Privacy Policy. WARP+ does not provide IP masking for Discord platform activity.

Q: What's the difference between WARP and WARP+?

A: WARP is Cloudflare's free privacy service, while WARP+ (included with Nitro) offers enhanced performance and routing. When you have an active Nitro subscription, you automatically get access to WARP+ features. If your subscription ends, you'll have access to the standard WARP features.

Q: Can I use this perk if I already have other privacy tools installed?

A: You can have WARP+ installed alongside other privacy tools, but running multiple services simultaneously may cause connection conflicts. We recommend choosing one privacy solution at a time for the best experience.

Q: Will this perk impact safety on Discord?

A: No, we remain deeply committed to creating positive experiences for our users and this tool is part of that commitment. Everything you could ever want to know about safety on Discord can be found here.

Q: Will WARP+ allow me to use an IP address from another country? 

A: No. WARP+ will assign you a Cloudflare IP address corresponding to the region in which you are connecting from.

articles.name: Discord Nitro Trial for Streamlabs Users
articles.title: Discord Nitro Trial for Streamlabs Users
articles.body:
Starting from November 24, 2025 (12PM PT) to March 19, 2026 (12PM PT), Streamlabs Ultra users can claim 1 month of Discord Nitro, while Streamlabs Ultra annual subscribers can claim 3 months of Discord Nitro. Learn below about how you can claim Discord Nitro.

Promotion Summary

Offer Details: 1 month of Discord Nitro for Streamlabs Ultra users, or 3 months for Streamlabs Ultra annual subscribers

Who is Eligible: Users who have had an active Nitro membership or Nitro trial in the last 12 months are not eligible to redeem this Nitro promotion.

Note: This promotion is not eligible in the following regions: Syria, Ukraine, Russia, Iran, and North Korea.

We may add additional restrictions from time to time, if you receive an "Unknown Gift Code" error during the claim/redemption process, you are not eligible to redeem this promotion. You can learn more at this article.

Users who have had a Discord Nitro membership at any point on their accounts and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic membership in the past 12 months are ineligible to redeem this promotion.

If a user has had a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting membership active on their account and they’ve never had a Nitro membership, redeeming this promotion will override that membership.

We will not be able to refund any leftover membership time from those, and the user will be forfeiting the remainder of the existing membership when activating the 1 month or 3 month Nitro trial.

Users who have already claimed a gift from this promotion are not eligible to claim further gifts from this promotion.

This promotion is not available in the following regions: Syria, Ukraine, Russia, Iran, and North Korea. If you receive an "Unknown Gift Code" error during the claim/redemption process, you are not eligible to redeem this promotion. You can learn more at this Help Center article.

Requirements: Claim through Streamlabs by March 19, 2026 (12PM PT), and redeem in your Discord account by April 18, 2026 (11:59PM PT).

Membership: After the 1 month or 3 month trial period, your Nitro membership will convert to a monthly recurring membership, and Discord will bill your payment method per month until you cancel it. You can cancel at any time in your Discord User Settings. 

What this article covers:

  • Promotion Summary
  • What is Discord Nitro?
  • What is Streamlabs?
  • How do I claim the Nitro Promo from my Streamlabs account?  
  • How do I redeem the Nitro Trial on my Discord Account? 
    • Eligibility for Redeeming the Nitro Trial
    • Step by Step Redeem Instructions
      • What if I am an Active Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting Member? 
  • Frequently Asked Questions
    • Promotion Details
    • Eligibility for the Promotion
    • Payment Info and Membership Questions
    • Potential Errors and Other Issues

What is Discord Nitro?

Discord Nitro is our membership plan that gives you access to special perks that’ll make your time on Discord as fun as ever! Personalize and enhance your experience with popular perks like HD streaming, 500MB file uploads, profile and avatar customizations, 2 free Server Boosts, and more:

  • Custom Emojis
  • Discord App Color Themes
  • Super Reactions
  • Avatar Decorations
  • Unique Server Profiles
  • Server Boosts
  • More Nitro & Nitro Basic perks

What is Streamlabs?

Streamlabs is a leading provider of live streaming tools and a brand of Logitech. It offers everything a creator needs to go live and grow their audience on platforms like Twitch, YouTube, TikTok, and more. With Streamlabs, content creators can engage with their viewers, monetize their streams, and manage all aspects of their live streams in one place.

Streamlabs offers a comprehensive suite of free tools and features to support content creators' live streaming journey. These include free broadcasting and recording software, tip pages, live alerts, chatbots, and more.

How do I claim the Nitro Promo from my Streamlabs account?

1. To claim your Nitro Promo, log in to Streamlabs.com using your Streamlabs ID or connect to a third-party platform.

2. You'll find the promotional card on the right side of your dashboard.

3. Press the claim button and you will be redirected to a Discord web page to complete the process. 

Your unique code will be automatically created upon pressing the claim button.

How do I redeem the Nitro Trial on my Discord Account?

Once you have claimed the promo, you'll now need to officially redeem this promo on your Discord account. You must redeem this Nitro trial by April 18, 2026 (11:59PM PT).

Eligibility for Redeeming the Nitro Trial

Note: This promotion is not eligible in the following regions: Syria, Ukraine, Russia, Iran, and North Korea. 

If you receive an "Unknown Gift Code" error during the claim/redemption process, you are not eligible to redeem this promotion. You can learn more at this Help Center article.

Users who have had an active Nitro membership or Nitro trial in the last 12 months are not eligible to redeem this Nitro promotion.

Users who have had a Discord Nitro membership at any point on their accounts and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic membership in the past 12 months are ineligible to redeem this promotion.

If a user has had a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting membership active on their account and they’ve never had a Nitro membership, redeeming this promotion will override that membership.

Users who have already claimed a gift from this promotion are not eligible to claim further gifts from this promotion.

Step by Step Redeem Instructions

If you're eligible and ready to redeem this Nitro membership on your own Discord account, you can follow these steps below to redeem the promo.

Note: 
- Before redeeming Nitro, make sure you are logged in your own Discord account.
- If you accidentally redeemed the Nitro promo on an account that is not yours, we are unable to provide you with another promo.

Step 1 - Logging into Discord

  •  If you're not already logged into Discord in your browser, you will then be automatically redirected to either:

Create an account Page (Left) and Login page (Right)

Step 2 - Claiming your promotion gift

Once you have logged in to your account, you will see a message asking you to claim your promotion gift. 

The account you are currently logged in as will receive this gift. This gift cannot be shared with a friend and once claimed, the gift cannot be switched to a different user, so be sure you are on the account you want to claim the gift for. If you want to change to a different account, press on the Switch Accounts.

Press on Next when you’re ready to redeem your gift on your chosen account.

Claim your gifts! Window

Step 3 - Redeeming your promotion gift

Review the details of the promotion then press on Next. 

Offer Confirmation Window

Note: if you switch to a different account at this step, you will not be able to claim and redeem the promotion on the account you switched to.

Make sure your payment information is accurate. If your Discord account does not have your payment information, please fill out your payment details. You will not be charged until the trial ends and the membership renews.

Payment Information

When you've filled out all the necessary information and you're ready to redeem this promotion, press the confirmation button.

Step 4 - Membership Now Activated

After accepting the promo to your account, you'll now be automatically redirected to your Subscriptions tab in your User Settings to see your newly activated Nitro membership on your account.

What if I am an Active Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting Member? 

Just to clarify - if you have had a Discord Nitro membership at any point on your account and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic membership in the past 12 months, you are ineligible to redeem this promotion.

So long as you have had a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting membership active on your account and you’ve never had a Nitro membership, you will be able to redeem this promotion and replace it with the 1 month or 3 month Nitro membership.

Important: By choosing to activate this 1 month or 3 month trial, you will lose any features associated with your current memberships, and **you will not receive a refund for any remaining value on your current membership**.

At the end of the promotion period, you'll be converted to a paying Nitro membership per month unless you cancel your membership.

Frequently Asked Questions

We know there's a lot of information to unpack on this promotion above, so we've also broken down this information in this FAQ section as well too.

  • Promotion Details
  • Eligibility for the Promotion
  • Payment Info and Membership Questions
  • Potential Errors and Other Issues
    • Already Had/Have Nitro
    • Already Redeemed
    • Something's Wrong Here

Promotion Details

Q: How long does this promotion run for?

A: Streamlabs Ultra users can claim Discord Nitro promo between November 24, 2025 (12PM PT)] to March 19, 2026 (12PM PT).

After March 19, 2026 (12PM PT), Streamlabs Ultra users will no longer be able to claim a trial promo.

Q: How long does the Discord Nitro promotion last for?

If a code has not been redeemed to the Discord account by April 18, 2026 (11:59PM PT), it will expire and you will no longer be able to have 1 or 3 month[s] of Discord Nitro.

1. To claim your Nitro Promo, log in to Streamlabs.com using your Streamlabs ID or connect to a third-party platform.

2. You'll find the promotional card on the right side of your dashboard.

3. Press the claim button and you will be redirected to a Discord web page to complete the process.

Additionally, users who previously had a Discord Nitro membership and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic membership in the past 12 months are ineligible.

If you have had a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting membership active on your account and you’ve never had a Nitro membership,  you will be able to redeem this promotion and replace it with the 1 or 3 month[s] Nitro membership.

At the end of the promotion period, you'll be converted to a paying Nitro membership per month unless you cancel your membership.

This is to help Discord confirm the payment method works as expected and to prevent the use of fraudulent payment methods. This charge will appear in your Discord transaction history, and it may appear as a hold on your payment method.

We immediately reverse the temporary hold, and you’ll see that reflected in your Discord transaction history. Your bank may take longer to remove the hold from your payment method.

Note: Banks will usually remove the temporary hold from your account within a few business days.

If your Discord transaction history does not show the hold released after 5 business days, please let us know at https://dis.gd/contact, and our support team will be able to investigate this issue further.

Potential Errors and Other Issues

A: If you're seeing an "Oh no! It looks like you have Nitro already" error, that means that the Discord account you're trying to redeem this promotion on currently has a Nitro membership so it is ineligible for this Nitro promotion.

If you have never subscribed to Nitro, please submit a ticket through our support system: https://dis.gd/contact and our support team will be able to investigate further.

Be sure to include your full Discord ID and email address tied to your Discord account.

Q: I see a "Looks like this gift has already been claimed" error when I try to claim my Nitro promo.

A: If you are seeing a "Looks like this gift has already been claimed" error, that means that the Nitro promo has already been used and cannot be used again. You may need to double check if you've claimed this promo on another Discord account.

Unfortunately, once the promo has been claimed, the promo cannot be re-enabled, and the Nitro cannot be transferred from one account to another.

Q: I see a "Wait a Second...Looks like this code didn't work." error when I try to redeem my Nitro promo.

A: If you're seeing an “Wait a Second...Looks like this code didn't work.” error, that means that the promo is invalid.

Please note that our support team is unable to intervene if you are given an invalid promo and we will not be able to provide a new promo.

Q: I see a “Looks like something went wrong” error when I click on “Next”.

A: There are several reasons why you may be seeing this error:

  • You are ineligible for this promotion
  • The promotion is invalid
  • The promotion has reached the maximum number of claims
  • The link is invalid

Please note that the Discord support team is not able to assist if you run into this error when attempting to redeem. See the list above for possible reasons why your account may be ineligible or otherwise unable to redeem this promotion.

Q: I see a "Sorry, This Payment Source Cannot Be Used for Redemption" error when trying to redeem my promo!

A: If you're seeing a "Sorry, This Payment Source Cannot Be Used for Redemption" error, that means that the payment method you've selected to cover the temporary $1 hold cannot be used for that purpose. 

Please keep in mind that prepaid payment methods, such as Gcash, cannot be used to cover temporary holds due to the nature of how prepaid payment methods function.

For more information on temporary holds, please check out this article!

Q: I see a “Looks like this promotion has reached its maximum number of claims” error when trying to redeem my promo!

A: If you are seeing a “Looks like this promotion has reached its maximum number of claims” error, that means the maximum limit for claims of this promotion has been reached and this promotion can no longer be claimed. If you have claimed this Nitro promotion, you are still able to redeem it to your Discord account!

Please note that the support team is unable to assist you if you run into this error and we are not able to increase the limit of claims.

Q: I see a “Looks like your email isn’t verified. Make sure to verify your email before claiming this gift.”

A: If you are seeing a “Looks like your email isn’t verified, make sure to verify your email before claiming this gift” error, you are trying to redeem this Nitro promotion on a Discord account with an email that hasn’t been verified yet.

You can check out this support article on how to resend the email verification for your Discord account. If you need help setting up your Discord account, you can read our Getting Started article. 

Q: I’m having trouble with my Streamlabs account.

A: Contact Streamlabs’ support team by submitting a ticket at https://support.streamlabs.com/hc/en-us/requests/new and select the Other category.

articles.name: Discord Checkpoint 2025
articles.title: Discord Checkpoint 2025
articles.body:
Discord Checkpoint is a personalized year-in-review experience that highlights your friendships, favorite games, and the communities that made 2025 special for you.

What this article covers:

  • What is Discord Checkpoint?
    • What's included in my Checkpoint?
  • How to view Checkpoint
    • Desktop/Browser
    • Mobile
    • One-time Pop-Up
  • Frequently Asked Questions

What is Discord Checkpoint?

Note: Not everyone will get a Checkpoint—it depends on your Discord activity and your data personalization settings. Check out the Frequently Asked Questions below to learn more.

Checkpoint is Discord's first-ever year-in-review experience. It’s a celebration of all the moments that made your Discord year unique!

What's included in my Checkpoint?

Your Checkpoint includes personalized stats about your year on Discord, such as the friends you talked to most, the games you played, the communities you called home, and more.

You'll also receive an exclusive Checkpoint Avatar Decoration that you can display on your profile until January 15, 2026, as a thank you gift for being part of the Discord community! 

Checkpoint 2025

How to view Checkpoint

Desktop/Browser

1. Check that you have the latest version of the app. 

2. Press on the flag icon [] in the top-right corner to access your Checkpoint.

Mobile

Important: Checkpoint has been temporarily disabled for Android. Checkpoint continues to be available on iOS, desktop and browser.

1. Check that you have the latest version of the app. 

2. Tap on the You tab in the bottom-right corner.

3. Press on the Checkpoint banner to view your Checkpoint.

Checkpoint banner on mobile

One-time Pop-Up

Eligible users may see a one-time modal pop-up that takes you to your Checkpoint. 
 

Modal pop-up for Checkpoint

Frequently Asked Questions

Q: Who gets a Checkpoint?

A: Checkpoint is available to users who were active on Discord during 2025 and have the Use data to personalize my Discord experience setting enabled in their Data & Privacy settings. We respect your privacy and only create Checkpoints for users who have chosen to enable this setting.

Q: Why don't I have a Checkpoint?

A: If you don't have a Checkpoint, it may be because you're new to Discord or were not active enough this year to compile stats for Checkpoint, or because you have chosen to have your data personalization setting disabled. 

Even if you don’t get a Checkpoint, you'll still be able to claim the Checkpoint Avatar Decoration as a thank you gift for being part of the Discord community! To claim the decoration, follow the steps for desktop or mobile in the How to view Checkpoint section of this article. 

Q: I'd like to change my data personalization setting.

A: You can learn more about your data personalization setting and how to change it in this support article. Note that changing your setting now won't give you a Checkpoint for 2025.

Q: If I change my data personalization setting now, will I get a Checkpoint for 2025?

A: Changing your setting now won't give you a Checkpoint for 2025. However, it would allow Discord to create personalized experiences like this for you if we offer them in the future. 

Q: How long will Checkpoint be available?

A: You'll be able to view your 2025 Checkpoint until January 15, 2026. 

Q: Who can see my Checkpoint? 

Only you can see your Checkpoint. You can choose to share it with others if you’d like. 

Q: Can I share my Checkpoint?

Yes! You can share your Checkpoint stats and celebrate your Discord year with friends. There's a Share button on your Summary page—just press it and choose where on Discord you'd like to share. You can also take screenshots of other pages and share them on Discord or other platforms.

Checkpoint shared in a text-channel

Q: What about my privacy?

A: We respect your privacy choices. Checkpoint is only available to users who have chosen to allow Discord to use their data to personalize their experience. This setting gives you control over whether Discord creates personalized features like Checkpoint for you.
